product_name: Marmot Vapor Trail Soft-Shell Hoodie Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's windproof, stretchy Marmot Vapor Trail Soft-Shell Hoodie Jacket is a great choice for trail runs, hikes and climbs. Stay warm without losing momentum. M2 soft-shell fabric on body and sleeves is windproof, stretchy, breathes well and has DriClime(R) wicking technology on the backer fabric. Even stretchier side panels and back offer amazing breathability. Durable water repellent finish helps shed light rain and snow. Adjustable hood features volume adjustments. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) allows full range of arm motion and prevents jacket from riding up when arms are raised. Asymmetrical cuffs feature elastic for a perfect fit; elastic drawcord hem cinches to keep weather out. Pack Pockets(TM) allow easy access even with a pack on. The Marmot Vapor Trail Soft-Shell Hoodie Jacket for women features a zippered sleeve pocket and an internal zippered media pocket with headphone port. Closeout.
short_description: The women's windproof, stretchy Marmot Vapor Trail Soft-Shell Hoodie Jacket is a great choice for trail runs, hikes and climbs. Stay warm without losing momentum.
